title: 김근호
content:
한양대학교
서울캠퍼스
의과대학
의학과 내과학교실 교수이다.
학력
1984, 서울대학교, 의학학사
1990, 서울대학교, 의학석사
1994, 서울대학교, 의학박사
연구실적
Kim S, Choi HJ, Jo CH, Park JS, Kwon TH, Kim GH: Cyclophosphamide-induced vasopressin-independent activation of aquaporin-2 in the rat kidney. Am J Physiol Renal Physiol 309:F474-F483, 2015
Park JS, Kim S, Jo CH, Oh IH, Kim GH: Effects of dietary salt restriction on renal progression and interstitial fibrosis in adriamycin nephrosis. Kidney Blood Press Res 39:86-96, 2014
Park JS, Jo CH, Kim S, Kim GH: Acute and chronic effects of dietary sodium restriction on renal tubulointerstitial fibrosis in cisplatin-treated rats. Nephrol Dial Transplant  28: 592-602, 2013
